subject: Simsonn plus x elastomers
description_text:
Hello, have you tested mixing elastomers?
Can we mix red/yellow/blue elastomers for having a diferent feeling?
I think i wanted a double staged felling
What would be the best combinstions we can have on the plus x?

conversations.body_text: Hi Osvaldo Sousa,    Yes, we freely combine elastomers based on our specific needs. Therefore, there is no single best combinstionsâ€”only the one that best suits your requirements.

Thank you, i will try mixing to get the feeling i want

A quinta, 30/10/2025, 02:33, support@simsonn.com
